WRITING.TEXT: Just to expand on this the movie is based on a musical with the name "Rocky Horror Show". I personally prefer the musical version, but both are great.
Wrong tools easy if you don't understand that reddit tables are not made to sort data.
You can sort it with excel and then insert it. It's not hard. It's a bit more work at first but it makes it easier to read for most of the people.

You are sorting dates alphabetical which is wrong. You are using something that is not made to sort tables to sort them. That is using the wrong tool(s) for the task. You could sort it in something that does it correctly and then insert it into reddit or something.
Then you are using the wrong tools for the job.

Your table is not formatted correctly if you have trouble sorting it. The table (e.g. Excel or even MySQL) should save it internally as a clear defined way most of the times it would be something like Linux epoch.
Then you give the column a formating which displays it how you like it, however the sorting will still be made on the original format which will sort the correct way.

You are looking at that point from the wrong point of view. It's not about trying to realistly simulate anything. It's abour creating a believeable world the game takes place in. This means that the world has rules the things and actors in the game have to follow.
Further down you are arguing against immersion, but you don't give any argument beside "you are wrong" against it. I would like to read some of the texts you seem to have found that say it's a hoax because my own research on that matter only produced articles and works that proved the point that there is something like that.
For examle [this article](http://www.psychologyofgames.com/2010/07/the-psychology-of-immersion-in-video-games/) gives a great overview of the works done on it. It also hints at that there are people that for not clear reasons have it harded to get immersed into a game.
From my own expierence I can say there is a thing like immersion, not only for video games but also for books and films. However not every game need to be immersive. Super Mario games are not immersive and still people enjoy them. Most strategy games are not immersive still I myself enjoy them very much.
However a game like A:I needs the player to immerse and invest themself into the game. If you are just looking at it form a distance without feeling any connection the protagonist you don't fear the Alien. At that point it's just a challenge you have to overcome and it looses it's horror. For horror to work you have to certain degree believe that it's real.

Der Unterschied ist meiner Meinung nach minimal. Es gibt ein paar Sachen die bei OwnCloud erst in der Enterprise Version drin sind die NextCloud integriert hat.
Aber im Endeffekt ist es egal welche man von den beiden nimmt die Clients arbeiten mit dem anderen zusammen. Beide haben auch die gleichen Probleme.
Unter anderem halt, dass die komplett in PHP laufen. Das hat den Nachteil bei einem Shared Hosting, dass man da an die Limitierungen wegen max_execution_time und memory_limit gebunden ist. Zu gegeben das greift nur wenn man PHP als FPM nutzt und nicht als FCGI o..

The reasons why Microsoft is used so much are pretty wide range. One of the most comon cited reasons is that people know the ecosystem.
If you buy a premade PC it comes with a Windows version already installed. Once you have Windows, why not go the full way and also use Office?
Another reason is that many custom and standard software is tailored towards the use of the Microsoft ecosystem. There was a huge timeframe when Linux and alternative OSs where not seen as good enough. Much less of alternative word processors.
An last but not least for bigger companies the biggest draw is most likely the support from Microsoft. If you are a big enough customer Microsoft will give you engineers when something goes wrong. I have seen this in my professional life when a huge electricity provider had problems with their Windows domain. For three days Microsoft gave them several engineers to help them rebuild it and rescue as much information from it as possible.
For the NSA scandal, well I think most people already knew what the NSA did. It was not seen as the biggest news all around.

WRITING.TITLE: 26/M/CE(S)T Looking for people to play with
WRITING.TEXT:
I only play on PC and am game jumping pretty often. I'm more of a casual gamer and don't need to be the best in every game fun is more important. The games I regulary play include: DOTA 2, Overwatch, Hearts of Iron 4 and Civ 5. However I'm open to most other games and if I don't want to play one I'm honest about it.
Ideally you would be in the same or near timezone as I work normal daytime job in the week and thus long nights are pretty hard to pull off regulary. Also you would be around my age group but at least 18.
If you are interested hit me up here on reddit and we can exchange contact info as I don't want to post any of my profiles in the public.

Because it's not a matter a for the police at all. Not everything that is against the law is a criminal act. You will have to complain to the institution in place to protect customers. They will investigate and then give a verdict with a fine or drop it.

Fun fact up until the 90s Jgermeister was considered a drink for older folks as a bitter. But they changed their image completely and now they are very much an in product.
Also I think they are way more popular outside of Germany than in Germany itself. At least from what I can tell when I'm out and about and from friends and such.

I do not want to fly around with a jumpjet, I want to play another Mass Effect game. I loved the combat in the previous titles. To me it felt challenging and it was something I had not seen before.
That is a fair point. I'm on the oppsite side. I found the combat boring and not fullfilling at all.
Do you really think Garrus is a bland stereotype?
Yes, he is the classic case of an police officer being disillusioned by the system he serves and leaves it. He then takes matters in his own hands. For me that is a stereotypical character arc. One that has been done so many time it's predictable. As in it was clear to me that in ME3 he will be with the highest Turian military, but leave his post to join you again. He may look badass and have some good dialoge, but for the most part I found him boring and predictable. He is most likely loved by many because how badass he is. Jack is not a guy but girl ;) And she is the typical "got used and abused by powerful people and is now a hard ass bitch hell bend on revenge and doing what she want". There are a few interesting points in her back story, as in she does not remember everything like it really happened. However the character while badass is still cliche as a whole.
Did the stuff you achieved in previous Mass Effect titles not feel like it had an impact?
For me? No, not at all. It all broke down to the matter "Am I playing Renegade or Paragon?" This whole morality system took away so much impact from the decision I had to made. In ME:A the system does not exist anymore. You can answer however you want. You can be a dickhead at times and then a nice person at other without getting somekind of point you need to unlock certain perks and dialoge options.
When you compare the voice acting to the original trilogy you just start to be ashamed of these characters. In about 3 hours of gameplay I have seen, they transported about 2 emotions. Happy and sort of happy but im in a life-threatening situation.
I disagree. The voice acting in ME:A is for the most part on par with the original triology in my book. As I said it's not the best voice acting ever, but it really get's it job done. A few characters suffer without doubt but others are just fucking great. Kallo is one example that comes my mind easily. Cora also has a great range of emotions from disappointment, to anger and even to happiness to a degree. It's just that those moments you only see when you talk with them and not when you watch somebody else play. Maybe it's also a difference when you yourself play vs. when somebody else plays.
Sure the graphics might be better, but thats because DICE created an engine that surpasses anything ive seen in video games and not because Bioware suddenly became graphics gods.
It's not just the graphics. The complete picture is stunning. Some of the landscapes are just drop dead beautiful and convey a sense of size that no game I have played yet have given me. It's not the bland grey and different grey of ME1 at all.
I didnt want another open world gather stuff with characters i dont care about. I wanted another Mass Effect.
That's okay and maybe the game is not for you then. Happens, but I'm not arguing that you should play it if you were not interested in a game like it. I'm arguing against the people who bash it to death without ever touching it and only watching some gifs and short videos on the internet about it.
Instead they made something that just cashes in on the Mass Effect name. Classic EA
I kind of disagree. It does not feel like a easy cach grab for me. The game has just as ME the potential to start a series of games that may very well be considered awesome. But that is for the future to see.

Metacritic is shit as is every fucking other systems that gives a score. Why try to shoehorn something into numbers that is just impossible to represent in numbers?
Honestly ME:A is in my opinion better then ME 1 or ME 3 by a wide margin. ME 2 is clearly the best ME but ME:A is the second best so far.
The fights are the best in all ME games I have played. They are way more fluid and not just a fucking "get in cover, shoot at enemy, get in next cover" as the games before it. There are very valid playstyles where you never really get into cover at all. The leveling systems which throws away classic classes gives so much ways to customize your fighting and playstyle it's awesome. I for one am playing a sniping biotic infiltrator. The crew for the most part is on level with the old crew members. They are not just carbon copies of them or just bland stereotypes. Like Garrus in ME1 or Jack in ME2. I found them for the most part interesting and sometimes endearing. The tone is a lot lighter in most cases than in the triology before. I like that. While you are fighting for survival it's not as bleak as the fight against the Reapers. The stuff you achieve actually feels like it has an impact on the people of the Initiative.
The animations are not great and we have been better in the last years. I agree with that. However they are not as bad as those videos like the linked one make them out to be. The crab walking thing for example has to be fucking forced by yourself to ever happen. The voice acting while not ground breaking is also not the worst voice acting I have heard in a AAA game. It's solid in most cases and for some character it dips into the shit category.
The graphics are stunning if you are on the planets. It's just beautiful and just gives you a sense of the sheer size of the place you are at. The Nomad is so much fucking fun to drive around. The Mako and the thing from Op. Overlord can go fuck itself.
All in all the game is not an groundbreaking epic masterpiece. It's a solid to good game that may lay the foundation for a series of games in Andromeda that may very well surpass the original triology. But that's just my opinion and it's worth as much as any other you will read/listen. It's always best to make yourself your own picture and then decide.

I think to really 100% it, as in all Achievements, you need to play it multiple times as there is one Achievement where you need to date three different crew members.
You'll also need to play the multiplayer quite a bit I think.

I have played 35 hours so far. And have done a fair share of side missions and stuff. Honestly the writing is not worse than any of the first three ME. The world builing is in my opinion really good. You have so much to explore and the more you explore the more you know about Andromeda and it's inhabitans. The lore goes deep and way back.
The problem with all critics and user rewievs is that the are to be taken with a grain of salt. Everybody has different tastes and as it has been numerous times in this tread. Try the 10hour trail and then decide. It's basicly a demo which most AAA title do not offer anymore.

Maybe I worded it bad. I meant in a way that guys are told and taught (not in school but by media) that they should keep pursuing a girl even when she said no. Because being persistent is the way to get her. Just look at many of the romance movies out there.
How often the male lead character is shot down by the female lead character just to persue her beside that. In the end they get together and are happy.
This teaches indirectly that as a guy you are supposed to be rejected and then keep pushing. Because in the end she actually wants you but does not know it herself or some stupid shit like that.
It's not a direct teaching in the sense that a teacher stands infront of a class of boys and tells them "Younglings when the female says 'No' she acually means 'Yes'". It's more subtle.
There are also more than enough jokes about how women mean "Yes" when they say "No". They also don't just come from rapists or creeps. This whole thinking that women don't say what they mean and don't admit what they want is deepy embedded in western culture.
So we all should try to be more open about our needs and what we want. Instead of branding a woman as something horrible just because she enjoys sex we should empower her to be able to live like that in a safe environment.
Instead of telling men that they need to look out for the most subtle hints that may be mistaken for being nice or vice versa. We should tell them that they can expect the person of desire to tell them when they are interested.
From my own expiernce and from what I gather from other sources. "Dating" currently is just a fucked up game where neither party wins. There are exceptions like with everything but for the most part it's not something that one party can suddenly solve on their own.
And sorry if I got ranty. This is just a topic which I feel strongly about and which to a degree annoys me. I read both sides and instead of trying to work together there is so much blame that is pushed around it just makes me mad and sad.

Honestly I think it's more of an issue what both genders are taught about dating and such. Men are told to be forward and to keep pursuing even after a clear "No" . And women are being called hideous names when they are forward about what they want and are taught that the men need to fight to get the right to be with them.
This creates a shitty expierence for both sides. The best solution for the most part imho would be to just teach both sides that they need to be honest with what they want. So no more signs people need to interpret just a "Hey, I wanna bone/date you" from both sides and many of theese encounters would not happen.
Not all that's for sure, because assholes will be assholes.
Actually it's not abolished it's put on hold. In theory it can be reactivated if the need for it exists.
I could do a heimlich maneuver if you want.
Weird is an understatement, you sound like you want to get something it of your throat all the time

They were and still are in all three games just as if not worse then in Andromeda. I just recently played through all three of them so I have a pretty recent comparison.
However I have to say that all three games have somewhat aged not to bad if you keep the Film grain active. Without it it's way worse.

You mean the same boot times I can get in windows 8? Granted, not in 7.
I humbly disagree there. Had Windows 8.1 on two computers one at work one at home. The work computer has "only" a HDD and my home PC has an SSD for Windows. After upgrading to Windows 10 the boot times where much better. I have the same amount of programs in autostart as before and nothing changed compared to 8.1 .
At work I even did the normal Upgrade way and not a clean reinstall and it's still significantly faster. At home I did a clean install and it just boots nearly instantly.
Maybe I could've gotten the same results with Win 8.1, but I would've had to optimize the shit out of it. In 10 I did not optimize it in any way.
Security? Really? They are supposed to upkeep windows 7 security until 2020.
You are right, but one can assume that some old ties may have been cut with 10 and thus even known or unknown security risks removed. Or just the plain fact that there are new security features included and stuff like that. In the end however a maintained Win 7 with a person who knows not download every attachment should be as safe as a Win 10.
"New technology support" - you mean like new CPUs? Anything else?
If I were to guess drivers for most new hardware will not work on older Windows out of the box. Or there may be new technologies coming which will not be backported to older versions. Good examples would be DirectX 11.3 and 12.0 both are only availabe on Win10. However if you are not into games that may not matter to you at all.
"Managing it" - what does that even mean?
I've been using Windows for years and I must say I find most options easier in 10 then before. But that is just my impression.
All in all I can understand that people are upset about it, however I can also understand Microsoft for makeing the move. I mean let's be honest here they want everybody on Windows 10 and they don't want to spend more time then really needed on the old versions.
If you want to compare it to Linux you would be hard pressed to find new feature updates for Kernels that are no longer maintained. If I remember correctly even the LTS versions do not recieve new features but only bug and security fixes.

Even IF it is a something that happens more often. The shift manager often times does not have the power to hire new people. So it is still fucking rude to blame people who can't do shit about the situation and are most likely also not happy about it. If you want to complain go to a person who is responsible if possible.

No, not really. Mark is an old unit for weight. So the "Deutsche Mark" is from the name origin akin to the Pound Sterling . However the Deutsche Mark was made after WWII before that it was "Reichsmark" and then a few different kind of "Mark" Rentenmark, Papiermark, Goldmark and the Mark as a currency it self.

Nicht hingefahren, aber Amerikanische Kultur hat gerade in der Nachkriegszeit sehr viel Einfluss auf das westliche Europa gehabt. Sei es Deutschland oder Italien.
Wahrscheinlich gab es schon vorher in Italien Pizzen, aber die Pizza wie wir sie heute kennen stammt mit hoher Wahrscheinlichkeit aus Neapel. Andere Gegenden und Stdte hatten andere Pizzen mit anderen Belegen etc.

If they are able to create a patch before the game comes out they could make the game work instead of forcing people to download parts of the game to even enjoy it.
I think you are oversimplyfing the matter a lot. If it is a game that is only released on digital download okay, but if the game also releases with physical mediums they can't do that. They need time to produce the discs or what ever and then time for them to ship to the distributors and so on and so forth.
However I agree that the game should be in a playable and enjoyable state when going gold, but that does not mean that day 1 patches are bad nor that they are mandatory.
All in all I think they have more positives then negatives as not all bugs are found before release of going gold and they allow the developer to fix them pretty fast instead of never fixing them.

Kein Hype, erstmal warten was draus wird wenn die ersten Leute ihre eigenen Rigs gebaut haben und damit dann testen konnten. Also Test in the wild. Sagt mehr aus, als die von AMD zur Verfgung gestellten Tests.
Aber selbst wenn die Ryzen etwas langsamer als die vergleichbaren Intel sind, dafr dann aber gnstiger, wre das fr den Markt als ganzes schonmal gut.

I've never been into the whole Mac v PC drama but what little I know from people that us macs is they're great for some aspects like graphic/art work but yeah they suck for games.
They are not (much) better than any Windows PC with the same specs, but back in the day they were and they got a reputation and that sticks.

Deinen PC direkt nicht.
Cookies werden oftmals fr Sessions genutzt, welche einer Seite sagen wer du warst und bist. Der Hacker kann sich also als du ausgeben bei den Seiten. Allerdings kann die Seite dagegen etwas unternehmen, in dem sie sich deine IP + Cookie merkt. Das funktioniert natrlich nur, wenn die keinen "Angemeldet bleiben" Haken haben und du den nicht ausgewhlt hast.

My latin teacher giving me the grade I needed to be able to continue with school to get a degree enabling me to study.
Where I'm from we have 10 mandatory school years after the 10 years you can get one of 3 degrees. The highest of the degrees allows you to keep going with school for another 2 (at my time 3) years. After this you are allowed to study. If my latin teacher would've given me one point less I would not have gotten the highest degree at class 10.

Das ist relativ. Ich knnte eine recht gute Schtzung abgeben wenn ich dafr z.B. meine Reisekosten Inland betrachte.
Ich mchte dir da ja jetzt nicht zu Nahe treten, aber ich denke nicht, dass der Datenpunkt reicht um da eine wirklich begrndiete Aussage ttigen zu knnen. Ich schliee ja nicht aus, dass es ggf. ein paar negative Auswirkungen hat, aber die Frage ist wie gro sind diese.
Wrde die Firma fr die ich arbeite Tagungsrume anbieten, htte ich davon abgeraten ihnen Rumlichkeiten zur Verfgung zu stellen. Wie auch sicherlich einige andere Hotelketten es ebenfalls zuvor getan haben.
Ist ja auch das gute Recht von jedem. Das ist das schne daran, dass wir relativ viel Freiheit genieen.
Ach die treten auch unter diversen serisen Namen auf. U.a. als Hilfsorganisationen die legal sind. Du wrdest doch nicht etwa einer Hilfsorganastion Rumlichkeiten verwehren!?
Macht's ja nur schlimmer, aber ich kann mir vorstellen, dass die Nazis das genauso machen. Also beste Lsung einfach niemandem mehr Rumlichkeiten vermieten ;-)

Der unterschied zu deinem Vergleich ist halt, dass es hier um eine Partei geht die aus einem Spektrum kommt welches jetzt nicht besonders gro ist in diesem Land. Wenn man wie schon gesagt nicht gerade von der NPD ist, wird dein Argument nicht zum Tragen kommen.
Es gibt aber noch die Leute, denen es auf gut Deutsch, schei egal ist. Das sind die Leute, wrde ich aktuell noch vermuten, die in der berzahl ist. Und wie auch gesagt, ist die Frage auch ob die von dir angepriesenen Leute sich dann noch dran erinnern wenn es relevant werden wrde oder nicht.
Allgemein finde ich das Argument ist einfach kein Argument, weil es einfach viele "was wenn" enthlt. Ohne eine Zeitmaschine wirst du niemals sagen knnen welche Auswirkungen es auf das Geschft haben wird.
Ich vermute, dass es langfristig keine oder vernachlssigbare Auswirkungen hat. Aber generell begeben wir Beide uns da auf unsicheres Terrain und raten mehr als das wir wissen.
Klar ist es in diesem Fall politisch, aber wenn man jetzt nicht die Entscheidungen frs Maritim fllt, wei man einfach nicht wann und wie eine solche Entscheidung gefllt wird.
Ich wre mal auf die Reaktionen gespannt wenn das Maritim den Salafisten o.. einen Raum bieten wrde.
Wenn du damit eine Randgruppe an Muslimen meinst, welche aber nicht zur Gewalt aufrufen o.. wre es mir genauso egal.
Meiner Meinung nach wre, wenn das Maritim nix mehr mit AfD zu tun haben will, die beste Mglichkeit, einfach in Zukunft keine neuen Vertrge zu schlieen und gut.

Naja, bei der Hufung die die Maritimkette bei rechtsextremen Veranstaltungen hat, (der "Anti-Islam-Kongress" von Pro-Kln/NRW/Deutschland wo sich die europische Rechte die Klinke in die Hand gab, war z.b. auch im Maritim in Kln). Sie haben offensichtlich kein Problem damit mit Rechtsextremisten zu kuscheln.
Ich habe ehrlich gesagt keine Ahnung wer alles wie oft in nem Maritim ne Veranstaltung macht. Aber ich finde die Rechten haben die gleichen Rechte wie die Linken. Das heit sofern sie nicht gegen irgendwelche Gesetzte verstoen und dies ihnen nachgewiesen werden kann sind es ganz normale Menschen. Zwar mit einer komplett anderen Ansicht als ich, eine Ansicht die ich nicht mag, aber dennoch ist es ihr Recht diese Ansicht zu haben. (Disclaimer: Sofern Ihre Ansicht zu Gewalt gegen irgendwem aufruft nicht)
Wer wei eventuell sind ja auch Entscheidungstrger in der Kette in dieser Szene irgendwie drin oder aber die denken sich einfach "Geld ist Geld, egal von wem es kommt". Ich bezweifel irgendwie nmlich, dass diese ganze Emprung darber ihnen lngerfristig viel Schaden machen wird.
Oder einfach knftig keine Vertrge mehr mit ihnen abschliessen. Kannst ja jetzt noch durchfhren, aber ein Statement raushauen das es knftig nicht mehr der Fall sein wird und sich den Gegenprotesten anschliessen. Haben schon so einige Gastwirte gemacht, die spter erfahren haben das sich nicht Vogelfreunde Hinterbuttelsbach e.V. bei ihnen einnistet, sondern eine rechtsextreme Gruppierung.
Klar, kann man machen. Werde es ihnen aber auch nicht negativ anhaften, wenn Sie es nicht tun. Nicht jedes Unternehmen will sich durch Aussagen politisch positionieren. Ganz ehrlich ist mir die politische Position von den Maritim Typen egal, da deren Hotels nicht zu denen gehren die ich Privat nutzen wrde.

Ich wei nicht woher diese blanke Naivitt immer kommt in solchen Diskussionen. Ich schrieb bereits an anderer Stelle:
Wirfst mir Naivitt vor, legst sie selber am Tag. Du und vielleicht ein paar hundert andere lassen sich davon berzeugen. Frage ist wieviele davon das Maritim zuvor eh schon in Betracht gezogen htten. Aber selbst von diesen paar Hundert haben das ganze in ein paar Jahren (3, 5 oder 10) die Meisten eh wieder vergessen und schon hat es keinen Einfluss mehr. Auf der anderen Hand ist das was die AfD da jetzt zahlt schon mal Geld was die kriegen, Geld mit dem sie **sicher** rechnen knnen.
Wenn ich nicht gerade der Veranstalter der NPD bin, wre ich vermutlich schon so clever zu wissen, dass man mir nicht die Veranstaltung aus der gleichen Motivation heraus verweigern wird wie man es bei der AfD getan hat.
N, auch wenn ich etwas mache, das im Auge von einigen Leuten kontrovers und demonstrationswrdig ist, wre das Maritim nach der Aktion eher ein Wackelkandidat. Gerade **weil** die dem Druck schon einmal stattgegeben haben. Das muss jetzt nicht mal etwas Rechtes sein, es kann theoretisch auch einfach ein groes Unternehmen sein, dass nicht gerade beliebt ist oder oder oder. Aber auch **wenn** ich sowas nicht erwarte, woher soll ich wissen, dass das der einzige Grund ist warum die das machen?
Wohl noch, den wollen Sie rauswerfen.

Wenn ich als privates Unternehmen nicht nach meinen eigenen Kriterien entscheiden drfte wen ich einlade oder nicht, wre das problematisch.
Nur ldt das Maritim niemandem ein, sondern vermietet ihre Standorte. Sie machen also das, was sie schon mit zig hundert anderen Veranstaltern gemacht haben. Der einzige Unterschied ist, dass es einigen Leuten nicht passt, dass dies so gemacht wird.
Ansonsten hat Demokratie hin oder her keine Partei irgendwelche Ansprche.
Das ist korrekt, aber genauso sollte es daher fr die Demokratie irrelevant sein, bei wem eine Partei die Rume fr ihre Versammlungen etc mietet.
Die wird genauso in Stadthalle Offenbach gewhrleistet wie im Maritim in Kln.
Korrekt und warum sollte jetzt das Maritim sie rauswerfen? Weil es fr dich oder fr die viele andere Twitternasen besser aussieht? Weil Sie dann eventuell mal ein paar Betten mehr verkaufen, dafr aber einiges an Geld verlieren?
Das Maritim ist ein Unternehmen und als dieses entscheidet es mit wem es Geschfte macht. Wenn es aber nun einen Rckzieher macht, wird das eventuell von greren potentiellen Kunden als Problem angesehen. Es zeigt nmlich, dass die Verantwortlichen Schiss vor ein paar Twitter Helden haben.

N, sehe ich komplett anders. Erstmal finde ich deine Wortwahl auf gut Deutsch unter aller Sau, denn sie suggeriert, dass die AfD auf der Flucht wre, was nachweislich nicht der Fall ist.
Desweiteren ist es als Geschft meiner Meinung nach noch weniger verwerflich, als wenn man es aus Idelogie macht. Die AfD ist zur Zeit eine in Deutschland zugelassene Partei, ob man das mag oder nicht, ist irrelevant. Als diese ist es ihr gutes Recht ein Hotel anzumieten fr ihre Veranstaltungen.
Klar, es ist im Recht des Hotels dies zu verweigern, aber so wie das aussieht besteht da ja schon ein Vertrag und dann ist es fr das Hotel wahrscheinlich eher schlechter aus zu steigen daraus, als die Zhne zusammen zu beien und es durch zu ziehen.

Businesstoleranz. Das werden sie sich sicher gut bezahlen lassen. Man muss ja auch nach den Demonstranten aufrumen.
Nichts verwerfliches und so sehr ich die AfD auch nicht mag und mchte, dass diese untergeht. Es handelt sich bei ihr (aktuell noch) um eine demokratische Partei und wenn unsere Demokratie es nicht abkann, dass es auch eine rechte Gesinnung gibt, dann ist etwas mit der Demokratie falsch. Genauso, wer Akzeptanz fr seine Meinung fordert, sollte diese auch anderen gegenber zeigen, auch wenn die Meinung anders ist.

Though he is right from a cultural/religious context though. At least when you are from a Christian part of the world. In the bible on the first day God created the the Light (aka Sun) so it was the Sunday. So the first day of the week is Sunday. To further support this in the Jewish culture the Sabath is the last day of the week. Sabath is Saturday not Sunday.
However in modern times we tend to think of a week in the terms of work, thus we moved the start of the week to the first workday, which in most cases is Monday.
To conclude both of you are right and neither is really wrong. It just depens on how you view it.
He is talking about 0C not 16C, which is a difference. I myself also learned in lakes with at max 18C water temp and really poor visibilty. However I would never go diving into 0C without a dry suit.

Sorry, aber dein ganzer Beitrag liest sich einfach nur als ob es dich strt, dass die Leute deine Arbeit nicht wrdigen. Kann ich verstehen, aber jede konstruktive Kritik die ich dir gebe, argumentierst du mit "Hab ich aber nicht so gemacht" weg.
Ich habe auf den Link geklickt, weil ich dachte, dass ich mehr als nur eine Liste von Trailern kriege. Wenn ich so eine Aussage wie in deinem Titel lese, dann erwarte ich etwas mehr als nur einfaches aneinander reihen.
Selbst Top 10 Listen auf YouTube geben mir mehr Infos ber die Sachen, die sie da auflisten als deine zusammenhanglose Auflistung von Trailern. Und nein, ich schaue mir ganz sicher keine Trailer von irgendwelchen Indie Games an ber die ich rein gar nichts wei. Da habe ich besseres mit meiner Zeit anzufangen, daher gehe ich bei einer solchen Liste wie von dir, davon aus, dass der Autor das fr mich zu einem gewissen Grad bernommen hat.
Ich beleibe bei meiner Aussage, der Beitrag ist fr mich etwas, das keinen Mehrwert bietet, weder dem Sub noch den Lesern. Du hast gesagt du wrdest Diskussion frdern wollen, aber das tut es nicht.
Vielleicht solltest du anstatt rumzunlen, dass das Sub den Beitrag nicht mag, dir die Kritik, die ich dir gegeben habe zu Herzen nehmen und es mit einer anderen Art von Beitrag probieren.
Das ist jetzt aber auch meine letzte Antwort, da ich, wie oben schon gesagt habe, das Gefhl habe, dass egal was ich schreibe du es nicht verstehen willst und ich ehrlich gesagt keine Lust darauf habe.

Wo soll du da eine Irrefhrung, eine bewusste Lcke oder eine Verzerrung durch den Titel sein?
Ich kann hier nur von mir ausgehen, aber du arbeitest hier mit einem Superlativ. Du sagst ausdrcklich das **sind** die besten Spiele die dieses Jahr rauskommen werden. Das bedeutet fr mich dann entweder, dass du dich gerne ohne Ende hypen lsst oder aber, dass du angeblich mehr Informationen als jeder andere hast. Httest du es anders formuliert, htte ich da kein Problem mit gehabt. Bspw. "31 Spiele die man 2017 im Auge behalten sollte" oder hnliches.
Zum Thema des Inhalts hier noch etwas deutlicher, was mich strt:
Es gibt mir 0 wirklich 0 berblick und sorry, auch wenn du sagst "Ich habe den Nachmittag damit verbracht die Liste zusammen zu stellen", ist es fr mich ein Low Effort Beitrag. Klar hast du viel Zeit aufgewendet, aber das war's auch. Deswegen ja mein Vorschlag, anstatt 31 Spiele nimm lieber ne kleinere Zahl und schreib zu jedem etwas. Das muss keine Auseinandersetzung im Detail sein, aber ein berblick. Einfach 3 W Fragen htten da schon gereicht:
- Was ist es fr ein Spiel? - Wer hat das Spiel entwickelt? - Warum ist es auf der Liste?
Mit den ersten beiden lieferst du mir als Leser Informationen ber jeden Eintrag, wenn ich ihn noch nicht kenne. Mit der dritten bietest du Anstze fr eine Diskussion. Den Trailer kannst du natrlich dennoch einbinden. Du hast mit dem Beitrag meiner Ansicht das was du erreichen wolltest verfehlt. Ich habe nicht mehr berblick darber als vorher, weil ich einfach nicht alle Spiele kenne und keine Lust habe fr jedes dieser 31 Spiele einen Trailer anzuschauen. Selbst wenn so ein Trailer nur eine Minute geht, wre das ne Halbe Stunde Zeit.
Es geht mir nicht besonders nahe. Ich frag mich nur, was damit auch im Sinne von r/zocken erreicht ist. Dieser subreddit ist ziemlich tot. Niemand postet irgendwas, niemand diskutiert irgendwas. Der populrsten Beitrag des vergangenen Monats hat satte 7 Upvotes geerntet.
Schn und gut, damit magst du Recht haben. Aber die Frage ist doch eher warum ist es tot? Ich kann mir gut vorstellen, dass die Schnittmenge der Leute hier mit anderen, englischsprachigen, Subreddits sehr gro ist. Da hat man dann nicht unbedingt Lust das gleiche Thema nochmal an anderer Stelle zu diskutieren.
Und wenn man dann seinen nonkommerziellen, thematisch passenden Blogartikel hier shared, wird man runtergevotet, weil manche einfach mal finden, dass der zu wenig Arbeit war und man besser ganz andere Blogartikel schreiben und posten sollte?
Hoppla, du hast Werbung auf der Seite, ich unterstelle jeder Seite mit Werbung einen gewissen kommerziellen Hintergrund. Es mag sein, dass es keine groe Seite ist und es mag sein, dass du kein Geld damit verdienst, aber das ist fr den Auenstehenden nicht ersichtlich. Desweiteren habe ich nicht runtergewhlt, weil es zu wenig Arbeit war, sondern weil es 0 Mehrwert bietet.
Wenn das Sub stirbt, dann stirbt es so einfach ist das.

Ich kann dir gerne erklren warum ich es runter gewhlt habe. Hat mehrere Grnde.
1. Finde ich den Titel persnlich schon bescheuert und theoretisch irrefhrend. Hat sowas Click Bait miges und da gehen bei mir schon alle Alarmglocken an, ich erwarte dort dann keinen guten Content und hier wurden die Erwartungen nur erfllt. 2. Der Inhalt des Links ist fr den Arsch. Wie soll ich ber eine solche Liste diskutieren, wenn diese Liste nichts anderes macht auer Trailer aneinander reihen? Der "Beitrag" selber setzt sich 0 mit den Spielen die er erwhnt irgendwie auseinander, auer das versucht wird Hype zu erzeugen oder auf der Hype Welle von den Spielen mitzureiten. Ich habe nix wo ich wirklich ansetzen kann.
Also anstatt hier dann passiv aggressiv rum zuheulen, solltest du dir eher Gedanken machen, wie du mit so einem Inhalt eine Diskussion anregen kannst. Reduziere die Anzahl oder schreibt wenigstens einen Absatz zu jedem Spiel (angenommen der Inhalt ist von dir). Wenn der Inhalt nicht von dir ist, dann berleg lieber zwei mal bevor du es postest oder lass es dir nicht so nahe kommen, wenn ein Link runtergewhlt wird.

All in all nothing serious happened there and the fire was caused by accident.

I honestly don't know. I have not studied German beside the shit we have to do in school. From my gut feeling I would say no, in most cases we have one not both.
As a German I would not know what it means. It's a nonsense word that somebody with a bit of German knowledge made up. So OP don't use it, it's not real and complete bullshit

Is it fair though? Do you have made a list of all mods for all games so that one can compare the games+mods and decide which one is better for their own tastes? If not, the comparision is useless und unfair.
You can't argue away a weakpoint of a game with "but there is mod for it", there may be, but it's not part of the main game. It's not part of what the developer made.

Mods are not the base game are they? If you compare 3 and NV with mods to 4 without mods, that is a useless comparision. After all there may be mods that fix some of the complaints you have against 4. So if you really want to compare them based on mods you would have to create an modlist for all games, that you are comparing.

Das ist mir auch bewusst, daher auch meine Relativierung, dass ich mich ber das Netz informiert hatte. Wenn die Telekom ein solches Angebot htte, auch fr ein paar Euro mehr, htte ich das genommen.
Aktuell ist die Situation fr Preis/Leistung bei Mobilfunk in Deutschland einfach unter aller Sau, das lsst sich nicht anders sagen. Wenn man mal in AT oder NL schaut, was die zahlen fr welche Vertrge wird man echt neidisch.

Also ich hab jetzt seit nem Monat diesen O Vertag und bin eher positiv berschascht. Hatte mich aber vorher auch informiert wie das Netz bei mir in der Gegend ist. Zahle aktuell 30/Mo fr Flat (SMS/Telefonie), EU Ausland Flat + 1GB Daten und 1GB Daten Highspeed und danach 1Mbit/s . Die 1Mbit/s reichen vollkommen fr das was ich damit mache und zwar Google Music Streamen wenn unterwegs. Letzten Monat hatte ich nen Verbrauch von knapp 4GB an Daten.
Ist natrlich nicht fr jeden was, aber ansonsten vom Netz sehe ich keinen Unterschied bisher zur Telekom (Congstar) von vorher.

1 1 setzt mittlerweile hauptschlich auf ein Vodafone Backend soweit ich wei. Zumindest beim Mobilfunk ist es hauptschlich Vodafone und je nach Vertrag auch E-Netz. Soweit ich das mitgekriegt habe, ist das gleiche beim DSL passiert, zumindest wurde die IP, als wir hier noch 1 1 hatten oftmals als eine aus dem Vodafone Netz identifiziert worden.

Honestly as someone who only has played DS1 on PC. The thing that turned me off most is the for me cumbersome fighting. It's not fun, it's not engaging at all. For me it felt like a rythm game. Attack - Dodge in the right moment - Attack and so on. It was not challeging just hard. The camera was cancer and honestly was most of the times the reason I died.
So yeah I don't understand the hype around the games. I don't think there are a good example for a difficult game, but more of a game that was made hard artificially.

Stimmt, aber bei (O)TTD waren die Tastenkrzel konsequent durchgefhrt. Bei Transport Fever ist es so, dass du scrollen kannst mit WASD, Pfeiltasten und Maus. Wenn du aber etwas baust, das Optionen hat (bspw. Schienen mit Tunnel oder Brcke) sind die Pfeiltasten dafr und du kannst du nur Maus + WASD scrollen. Wenn du aber so baust, dass du keine Optionen hast, dann gehen die Pfeiltasten immer noch.

Also ich habe Transport Fever und Train Fever und ganz ehrlich von den Mens finde ich Train besser als Transport. Auch muss man jedes Gebude immer von Hand drehen, was aber nur in Stufen geht. Das ist etwas nervig.
Generell muss da noch viel, gerade in Sachen Bedienung gemacht werden, damit es ein wrdiger Nachfolger von TTD oder OTTD.

Nobody likes to see neo nazis marching around. But is jailing people for years over hand jesters a viable alternative?
Yes, because it's not about see neo nazis marching around. It's about a symbol of an organization that is forbidden in Germany, because it is/was against everything modern Germany stands for. The organization those symbols belong to are against our constitution.
If you disagree with the neo nazis start a counter protest. Debate them. Shine light on just how stupid their beliefs are.
Like this is not already happening. You see that most modern nazis in Germany distance themselves as far as possible from the Third Reich without breaking with the fundamantal idiots.
But using the power of the state to silence dissenting opinions is oppressive, so long as the people spouting those opinions remain nonviolent, no matter how foolish or disgusting those opinions may be.
It's not an opinion to deny the holocaust. The holocaust is a sad and tragic history. It's not an opinion to endorse organizations that were responsable for the holocaust and a war which devasted most of Western Europe.
But the name of the game is freedom, and you can't give up freedoms to maintain them.
Yes, you sometimes have to give up freedoms to ensure that the other freedoms are not impeded. Also your freedom ends where the freedom of other begins.
In the end you can do as many Hitler saluts as you want in privacy with your mates, but when you do it in public or even worse on a demo, then you are in trouble.
But that is all I will say to you on that matter, because frankly I'm tired of trying it to explain to people, who are just crying "but freedom".

Did I write anywhere that the damage of a longsword which is thrust should be the same as for a cut? Didn't I even give examples how I would change the damage depending on the sword?
Gladius shortsword 1d6 piercing/1d4 slashing
would be an example. All I said that I would not count it as a improvised weapon. I mean, you have to adapt the dice used for the damage for the specific weapon choice. As neither short sword nor long sword are very precise definitions of it.
Like an Estoc is a kind of longsword, but it has an edgeless blade with an sharp point. So not really useful when cutting but good for thrusting. On the other hand you have the Zweihnder which is so long that it does not have a sheath.
This is something that has bugged me about D D for a bit, because on the other hand they have a few weapons which they define rather great and nuanced. A Rapier for example is a pretty narrow definition, even though most people confuse it with an pe.

It is advertised as that yes, but what OP meant in is comment is most likely NOT bit but bytes. He said he can download about a terrabyte a month. So it's easy to figure out by that, that he did not mean kb but KB .
And as you rightfully noted the notation maybe that, but non technical people either don't know or honestly don't care about it. The same with the 1000 vs 1024 ;) .
I think he meant 300kilobytes/s so he has ~2400kilobit/s . Because the download speed shown in browsers and steam is always in byte not in bit .

Maybe, but maybe we are just interpreting it differently. Which does not mean one of us is wrong. It just means that we have different views on it.
For me being profficent with a weapon means that I know how to handle the weapon in more than just basic use. It means for me, that I know how to handle it, know it's limits, know it's weaknesses and strength. I also know most if not all typical and viable usages of it, which may include thrusting with a longsword.
Isn't that the good thing about DnD? There are rules, but in the end it's up to the DM to decide how something is handled. Both our ways a viable and I would say both have their places in the world.

But then you defined what kind of short sword it is. That's basiclly what I meant. If both player and DM agree that he has a Gladius type sword then go for it. Otherwise it should be made clear by both sides and handled accordingly.

But that is the thing. If you are proficent with a longsword, you would know how to thrust with it. You don't need to know how to fight with a speak or any other weapon. Your training with a longsword normally would cover that, because it's part of how to use a longsword.
That is where it clashes for me, because there is for me no reason why somebody who is proficient with a weapon should not know most, if not all, possible uses of said weapon.

That may be, but depending on the sword type it is not improvised at all. For me an improvised weapon is something that was not intendet as a weapon used as such or used a weapon in a way it was not intended. However if a sword is intended to be used for cutting and thrusting it is not improvised and I personally would expect a fighter to know both ways.

I kind of disagree, because for the example you give there are variants. There are thrusting swords like the roman Gladius or swords that are made for both like the Xiphos. So it would depend on the sword what is the right way to do it. Most likely though I would be easier to reduce the damage instead and maybe not giving the modifiers on the attack roll. Kind of like a second weapon without the feat.
E.g. a Gladius with 1d6 piercing damage has only 1d4 slashing. A Xiphos however has 1d6 piercing/slashing, because they are made for both.
Then there are cases where I would agree with you mostly. Like a rapier is made for thrusting not for cutting at all or a claymore is made for cutting not for thrusting. So I would make it an improvised weapon. However again a pummel attack with an Claymore is something that was commenly used against heavly armored enemies, there I would again just reduce the damage, but not take anything else away.

I mean I can kind of understand why they removed those things in newer Fallout games. I would not want to hear the outcry in the media if they would allow you to kill children in a game like Fallout or Skyrim.
It does not mean I agree that they did it, but it's understandable to a degree. After all Fallout is not GTA which strives on controversy in the normal media.

Ich persnlich sehe mehr Protabilittsprobleme wenn man Binre Daten in einer SQL-DB speichert. Du kannst nmlich Binre Daten nicht einfach als SQL File dumpen, sondern muss dir einen Prozess bauen, der dir das Bild entsprechend liefert. Wenn du hingegen den Pfad speicherst, musst du diesen anpassen, was in den meisten Fllen mit einem einfachen UPDATE oder sogar Suche+Ersetzen auf ne SQL Datei getan ist.
Und bezglich ACID kann man das im Notfall auch die Applikation lsen lassen und muss nicht alles vom DBMS handeln lassen.
Wie gesagt meiner Meinung nach haben Bilder nichts in einer relationalen Datenbank verloren. NoSQL und was wei ich fr Datenbanken meine ich damit gar nicht, da oben explizit MariaDB und PostgreSQL erwhnt wurden.

Dir ist klar, dass b64 einiges an Overhead hinzufgt bei einem Bild oder? Wenn du etwas b64 kodierst fgst 33-37% an Overhead hinzu. Fr den gleichen Speicherplatz den deine 4500 Base64 kodierten Bilder verbrauchen kannst du rund 6000 nicht base64 kodierte Bilder speichern. Natrlich nicht ganz, aber so bern Daumen halt.

Beide knnen BLOBs, aber sein wir mal ehrlich, die Bilder sind besser auf dem Dateisystem aufgehoben, das ist von "Natur" aus darauf ausgelegt mit sowas umzugehen.
Zumal es je nach Einstellungen in MySQL auch Probleme geben kann beim Lesen/Schreiben eines BLOB wenn er grer als die Package Size ist.
Bilder sollten auch nicht in der (MySQL-)Datenbank stehen, wenn dann nur die Information wo im Dateisystem man die Bilder findet.

You know that there are kind of 2 versions of the Nurburgring right? One is the GP course which was driven by the Formula 1 the last times they were there and then there is the Nordschleife. Which was driven by Formular 1, but then a new GP course was built in the 80s for saftey reasons and what not.
Honeslty modern F1 cars would not fare well on the Nordschleife or "Grne Hlle" (Green Hell). The track was not made with such cars in mind.
Today the main reason the Nrburgring is not in the F1 calendar is money.

Ehh it's kind of more complicated than that. There are cities that have laws in place that make it illegal however at least one of those got voided by a court.
In general I agree with you, that it's legal in Germany to drink in public. As far as I know it's also legal in most countries in Europe. The only exception I know is Poland where it's only legal around bars and public events like stadiums.

Which is bullshit. Save it as a CLOB and you can save several books in it. Most DBMS the limit is somwhere at 2GB of text data. If we would just allow ASCII characters whe would have space for 2,147,483,648 characters for UTF-8 you have atleast space for 536,870,912 characters. The reason for at least is that if you write only ASCII characters in UTF-8 you still would have the larger amount of characters possible, because the size of on character varies in UTF-8 from 1 to 4 byte.

Das hat nichts mit Polizeigewalt zu tun. Soweit ich das deute, war es keine legale Demonstration, bei welcher wohl auch verbotene Zeichen genutzt wurde. Letzteres wurde von der Polizei unterbunden, weswegen, soweit ich das sehe, die Demonstranten handgreiflich wurden. Anschlieend hat die Polizei die Demonstration aufgelst und dabei Festnahmen gettigt.
In wie weit die angewandte Gewalt der Polizei in dem Fall berechtigt war oder nicht, lsst sich nur schwer aus dem zusammen geschnittenen Material heraussehen.
Meiner persnlichen Einschtzung der vorhandenen Bildern her, wrde ich aber sagen, dass die Polizei wenig wirklich Gewalt angewendet hat und mehr auf Drohgebrden gesetzt hat (siehe der eine Polizist mit erhobenem Schlagstock oder auch die Hunde, welche zu keinem Zeitpunkt den man sah einen Demonstranten angriffen).

WRITING.TITLE: Should I start actively looking for a new job?
WRITING.TEXT:
Currently I work at a really small webhoster and with really small I mean small. We are 3 people at the office two of which are my bosses and owners of the company. Beside myself there are also three contractors that are located at different places. One of whom I never had any contact to because he is our hardware guy who installs the servers at the co-location.
All in all the people are great. Here and there we butt heads, but that is to expected. From a human standpoint the job could not be better. My bosses are both understanding and throw a fit if I have to take a day off on short notice.
However it's a dead end. If I stay in this job I will be in the same position as right now. Which is not so bad in itself, but kind of sad I feel. Also the pay while not too bad is also more on the lower end for the job that I do and the experience I have.
So I started thinking about trying to find a a new job, that has better chances and pays better. I'm even thinking about to leave my home country (Germany), but it's really hard to decide. So I ask you guys for input.
Oh and for information: I'm a 26 year old IT worker with 4-5 years of working expierence and an qualification in the area. Though I did not complete my studies so I don't have a degree.

Is the PE version feature complete compared to the Java version? I honestly don't know because I only play the Java version and not that much anymore.
I know about mods, when I play I play a modded version most of the times. However if they ported the game to another engine and/or language all the mods would not be compatible at first.
All in all I don't think that the Java version will be discontinued anytime soon. It's just not worth the hassle at them moment.

You know what the big difference between Star Citizen and Minecraft is? You know what makes you whole point you are trying to make here worthless?
Minecraft started as a one person project. This one person choose the tools he was comfortable with. They may not be the best tools, but that did not matter at that pont. Star Citizen already had a studio behind it and as far as I know the people behind it have experience in game development. They are completly different in how they started.
I'm not saying that Minecrafts solution is the best and I would guess that even Notch agrees that in hindsight it was not the best idea, but that is the thing. It's fucking hindsight.
And no rewriting the whole game with a new engine and a new language and shit would not be easy or even worth it. Do you know how many people would cry when their beloved mods don't work anymore? Do you know how many mod developer would outright stop developing because they don't want to learn a complete new system?
While I agree that Java was not the best choice, it's the choice that has been made and now it's way to late to change it. Maybe if at any point in time there would be a Minecraft 2 a change could be made, but up until then, there is no feasible way to do it without pissing off a huge portion of the playerbase.
What is your definition of a celebrity? I'm curious, because for me everybody who is in public interest is a celebrity of some description.

Ich fahre seit einigen Jahren tglich die Linie zwischen Dortmund - Aachen und/oder Duisburg - Aachen (nicht komplett aber einen Teil davon relativ mittig gelegen) und habe in der Zeit ein oder zwei Mal Ausflle oder Versptungen 10 Minuten gehabt. Normalerweise bleibt es bei 5 Minuten. Da mit eingeschlossen ist ne Baustelle ber mehrere Jahre im Bereich Aachen, der Stellwerkbrand in Mhlheim und ich glaube 2 Zugfhrer Streiks.
Davor bin ich einige Zeit Sauerland - Essen/Essen - Sauerland gefahren. Mehrere Umstiege an div. Bahnhfen und auch da nie wirklich Probleme mit Versptungen.
Generell macht die Deutsche Bahn einen anstndigen Job, ja es ist nicht perfekt und ja vieles knnte durchaus besser sein. Alles im allem kann ich persnlich nicht sagen, dass ich die Bahn so schlecht finde wie viele behaupten. Interessanterweise sind die grten Meckerkppe oftmals Personen die unregelmig Bahn fahren.

You have any source on that? I could not find it anywhere that it matters how strong the drink is. All I found that matters is the sugar content and stuff like that.

Where I'm from the average beer can is 50cc
50 x 0.05 = 2,5cl of pure alcohol
so the can of beer wins.
A shot of vodka has less alcohol in it than a can of beer same for espresso in regards of caffeine. It has a higher content per volume but lower per serving
No, it was not disrespectful at all. I (and I think many other Germans) just have a bit of a habit to go into to much detail regarding the rise of the NSDAP and WW2. No harm done
